rows.label: qst501906_msg0001
rows.name: The Cloud Sea's great, don't you think?

rows.label: qst501906_msg0002
rows.name: It's so huge and beautiful...

rows.label: qst501906_msg0003
rows.name: I want to become a salvager, you know.

rows.label: qst501906_msg0004
rows.name:
I got to try it out once, years back!
Didn't find anything, even though
they let me use a Silver Cylinder...

rows.label: qst501906_msg0005
rows.name: But even so, it was so much fun!

rows.label: qst501906_msg0006
rows.name:
Don't you think it'd be great
to be able to do a job you enjoy
in a place you love?

rows.label: qst501906_msg0007
rows.name: How best to respond?

rows.label: qst501906_msg0008
rows.name: Agree that it's a wonderful thing

rows.label: qst501906_msg0009
rows.name: Say you're not so sure

rows.label: qst501906_msg0010
rows.name: I know, right?

rows.label: qst501906_msg0011
rows.name:
...It's just a dream for me right now,
though. My family don't have the cash
to buy any salvaging gear.

rows.label: qst501906_msg0012
rows.name: Give him a Golden Cylinder?

rows.label: qst501906_msg0013
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: qst501906_msg0014
rows.name: No

rows.label: qst501906_msg0015
rows.name:
A Golden Cylinder...
For me? Really?!

rows.label: qst501906_msg0016
rows.name:
I don't even know how many years
it would take me to earn the money
for something like this...

rows.label: qst501906_msg0017
rows.name:
Just looking at it is making me want
to become a salvager even more...

rows.label: qst501906_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah, someday I'll use this and
salvage something really good.

rows.label: qst501906_msg0019
rows.name:
I'll haul up some incredibly rare
treasure, sell it off in Avaritia...

rows.label: qst501906_msg0020
rows.name:
And use that money to buy a house
in Gula where we can all live!

rows.label: qst501906_msg0021
rows.name: Gotta keep dreaming big, right...?

rows.label: qst501906_msg0022
rows.name:
Thank you so much for this!
I swear I'll become a salvager someday!

rows.label: qst501906_msg0023
rows.name:
I guess you have a point...
The jobs you really want to do aren't
always the best ones for your life...

rows.label: qst501906_msg0024
rows.name:
I'd still love to try salvaging again
someday, though...
